thread.title: Vote: Who stays or goes on Falcons’ defense
thread.title_full: Vote: Who stays or goes on Falcons’ defense

author: AJC Sports
title: Vote: Who stays or goes on Falcons’ defense
text:
The Atlanta Falcons reached the 2017 Super Bowl with a roster that included a defense that included three rookie starters .
With free agency and the NFL Draft approaching the team has decisions to make on a number of free agents and underperforming players.
12 key offseason dates for Atlanta Falcons
Look through the 2016 Super Bowl Atlanta Falcons' offensive roster and decide on whether the player should stay or go.
See how your answers compare to AJC Falcons beat writer D. Orlando Ledbetter’s .
Vote: Who stays or goes on Falcons offense
